group_1.textLeft: Phew…
I'm exhausted…
These people throw feasts outta nowhere@whenever they get some spare time…
For sure…

group_1.textRight: …How long do we have to keep@doing this?
Forced to work under the people who killed@our father and our loved ones…

group_1.textLeft: …We had thralls of our own back@in our hometown.
I wonder if they felt just the same way…
The strong eradicate the weak…
That's the way things are in this world.
Our father plundered many other places.
And then it was our turn to be the victims…
…C'mon, Gunhild!
We gotta quit sulkin' like this!

group_1.textRight: How many times have you mentioned@that before?

group_1.textLeft: Haha, sorry, sorry…@Just me bein' stubborn.
More seriously, though, I really do think@that way.
I don't want a world where everything's@take-or-be-taken for now and forever!
We gotta break the cycle somehow!

group_1.textRight: You can say that all you like. It doesn't change@the fact that we're nothing more than thralls.

group_1.textLeft: It'll be fine!@We'll be free someday!
The gods'll help us, that's how!
…At least, they should!
*Chuckle* …But still, we gotta believe!
Hey gods, if you guys set us free…we'll give@you somethin' in return!
So please give us a chance!@…I'm always askin'…
Just give us one little opportunity for us@to change our circumstances…

group_1.textRight: Are they really gonna heed our request@with an offering as vague as that…?

group_1.textLeft: Look, I can't think of anythin' right now…@but it'll be fine, 'cause it'll be for them!
And also! Once we're free…
We'll get a huge ship like our father's, and…!

group_1.textRight: And we'll sail around the world together!

group_1.textLeft: Exactly, exactly!
First we'll go all around the coast, then over@to Rome, and then to wherever we please!
Oh yeah! Remember that time when that Roman@merchant came by our village?
He said there was a country made completely@outta sand!

group_1.textRight: Yes, I remember him saying that!

group_1.textLeft: He said it's blazin' hot every day.@I wonder what it's like to live there...!
Ah, what other kinds of lands are out there…?

group_1.textRight: Hmm…I can't even begin to imagine…

group_1.textLeft: I'd love to see 'em all…with our ship…
Go and see…all kinds of places…

group_1.narration: ―Gunhild―@(Thank you again for what you did today, Olga.)
―Gunhild―@(Listening to your stories always lifts my spirits…)
―Gunhild―@(I want to make your dreams come true…)
